desc: For over 25 years, WhisperGLIDE wheelchair accessible swings have brought joy to life for thousands throughout North America. Whether you are able to run, walk or are using a wheelchair of almost any design, the WhisperGLIDE wheelchair swing and RockerGLIDE Compact Rocker offer a seat for everyone.

layout.text: For nearly 30 years, the WhisperGLIDE Swing Company's wheelchair accessible product line has provided an inclusive and therapeutic movement experience for both the young and young-at-heart with special needs and mobility issues.
